title: Pakistan, China agree on high-quality CPEC development in 2023
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 2 (APP): Chinese Ambassador in Pakistan Nong Rong on Monday called on Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari wherein the two sides reviewed achievements of Pak-China relations during the past year and agreed to maintain momentum in 2023.
The two sides agreed to maintain the pace of bilateral ties through the high-quality development of China Pakistan Economic Corridor and stronger people-to-people contacts, the foreign minister wrote on Twitter.
They also agreed to accelerate the post-flood reconstruction to build back better.
